verbose_text: Moreover, Endophilin blocks Dynamin mediated membrane fission at high local concentration [XREF_BIBR], suggesting a mechanism to exclude Dynamin from forming tubules and restricts its localization to their extremities.
evidence: Endophilin blocks Dynamin-mediated membrane fission at high local concentration [ XREF_BIBR ], suggesting a mechanism to exclude Dynamin from forming tubules and restricts its localization
